Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Radisson Blu es. Hotel, Roma, you'll be centrally located in Rome, steps from Teatro Ambra Jovinelli and Piazza Vittorio Emanuele II. This 5-star hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 232 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Partially open bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a health club, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Rome? This hotel has facilities measuring 7104 square feet (660 square meters), including a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Teatro Ambra Jovinelli - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Piazza Vittorio Emanuele II - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
National Museum of Oriental Art - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Santa Prassede - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Colle Oppio Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Baths of Trajan - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Historic Museum of the Liberation - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Porta Maggiore - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Diocletian Bath - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Octagonal Hall - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Palazzo Massimo alle Terme - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
University of Roma-La Sapienza - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Teatro dell'Opera di Roma - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 12.8 km / 8 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 23.9 km / 14.9 mi

The preferred airport for Radisson Blu es. Hotel, Roma is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Radisson BLU es. Hotel, Rome are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 12.8 km / 8 mi
Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci) - 23.9 km / 14.9 mi

The preferred airport for Radisson BLU es. Hotel, Rome is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure are subject to 100 percent charge.
